channel.title: CVE Feed for Fresenius Kabi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fresenius Kabi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-33846|2024-08-04T00:05:51.069Z -- fresenius%20kabi -- vigilant%20software%20suite%20%28mastermed%20dashboard%29
item.description: Fresenius Kabi Vigilant Software Suite (Mastermed Dashboard) version 2.0.1.3 issues authentication tokens to authenticated users that are signed with a symmetric encryption key. An attacker in possession of the key can issue valid JWTs and impersonate arbitrary users.

item.title: CVE-2021-33848|2024-08-04T00:05:51.018Z -- fresenius%20kabi -- vigilant%20software%20suite%20%28mastermed%20dashboard%29
item.description: Fresenius Kabi Vigilant Software Suite (Mastermed Dashboard) version 2.0.1.3 is vulnerable to reflected cross-site scripting attacks. An attacker could inject JavaScript in a GET parameter of HTTP requests and perform unauthorized actions such as stealing internal information and performing actions in context of an authenticated user.
